text: 大姨妈是period，但是aunt flo (俚语) 更贴切。吃错药了在不同语境可译成：nuts, crazy。其它：黄牛党 scalper; 出气筒 punching bag; 山寨，水货 knockoff, copycat; 纯爷们儿 macho men; 卖萌 selling cutesy, acting cute; 吃货 food junkie; 去你的 get lost! [偷笑]
哈哈，英语也有大姨好这一说呀。Aunt flo.
大姨妈period，但俚语aunt flo更贴切。吃错药了根据语境还可译成：nuts/crazy。其它：黄牛党 scalper; 出气筒punching bag；山寨knockoff/copycat；水货smuggled goods；纯爷们儿macho men；卖萌selling cutesy/acting cute；吃货food junkie；去你的get lost!
Bro I think u get up on the wrong side of the bed since ur aunt flo has not visits yet
